Bulletin printed in Peru
     Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship on Oct. 18 printed a bulletin to mark the fifth anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "Socialism Is a Science."
